AccountProtectionDesc: Protect your accounts with a unique passcode. Tap the lock icon above your chat list to access them.
AccountProtectionHint1: Tap the lock icon above your chat list to access your hidden accounts.
AccountProtectionHint2: When an account is protected with a passcode, it will be hidden from the side menu.
AlternativeNavigation_Desc: Use a different navigation style when navigating through the app
AreYouSureDeleteXMessages: Are you sure you want to delete the chat history for this user?
ContextElements_Desc: Customize the elements in the context menu
ContributeOcto_Desc: Ajuda'ns a crear una millor app si ets un desenvolupador/a
CrashDeleteConfirmation: Do you want to delete one crash log? This action is irreversible
CrashDeleted: One crash log has been cleared
CrashLogInfo: Crash logs are stored locally on your device. You can copy them to your clipboard or delete them by long clicking.
CrashesDeleteConfirmation: Do you want to delete %s crash logs? This action is irreversible
CreatePasscodeInfoPIN2: Please enter any 4 digits that you will use to unlock your Telegram account.
CreatePasscodeInfoPassword2: Please enter the password you will use to unlock your Telegram account.
CustomEmojiSetHint: Importa i tria conjunts d'emojis des del teu emmagatzematge intern.
DatacenterStatusSection_Desc: Check the Telegram's Datacenter]]> Status in realtime.
DcIdTypeDescription: L'API de Telegram ensenya els ID's tal com són, mentre que el Bot API introdueix un "-" pels grups i un "-100" per supergrups, grups de difusió i canals.
DeleteAccountLastPopup: Wait, let's talk seriously. This is the last popup that appears. Once you confirm this, you will no longer be able to do anything. Are you sure you want to continue?
DeleteAccountLastPopupFailed: In order to verify your identity, you need to set up two-factor authentication.
DeleteAccountStep1Description: You will lose access to all your Saved Messages as well as all messages, media and files from your chats.
DeleteAccountStep2Counter: More than %d channels and groups will be deleted
DeleteAccountStep2Description: The groups and channels you created will either get new admins or become orphaned.
DeleteAccountStep3Counter: More than %d chats with other users will be deleted
DeleteAccountStep3Description:
Your chat partners will keep their message history with you, including the messages you shared in Secret Chats.

You can remove any messages for both sides at any time, but this will not be possible if you delete your account.
DeleteEmojiSetsMessage: Segur que vols eliminar el conjunt d'emojis seleccionat?
DisableAccountProtectionAlert: Are you sure you want to disable the account protection feature?
DisableCameraPreview_Desc: Disables camera preview in the attachments menu
DrawerElements_Desc: Customize the elements in the drawer
EmojiSetAppliedInfo: %1$s és ara el teu conjunt d'emojis.
EmojiSetHint: Això afectarà l'aspecte dels emojis només per tu. Els altres els veuran segons les seves preferències.
EmojiSetRemovedInfo: %1$s ja no està en el teu conjunt d'emojis.
EnableSmartNotificationsForPrivateChats: Habilita les notificacions intel·ligents pels xats privats
ErrorEmojiFontInvalidFormat: L'arxiu ha de ser un arxiu de font d'emoji.
ErrorSendingCrashContent: Hi ha hagut un error enviant els registres d'aturada
ExportDataDescription: Choose a custom name for the file or press share directly to send it to a trusted chat.
ExportDataShareDone: Export file has been sent successfully.
ExportDataShareFailedCustomFileName: The specified file name cannot be used. Try another name.
FeatureCurrentlyUnavailable: Aquesta funció no està disponible actualment :(
ForcePacmanAnimation_Desc: Force pacman animation when archiving a chat
HideChatFoldersWhenForwarding: Amagar les carpetes de chat al reenviar
HideCustomEmojis_Desc: Hides all custom emojis in the keyboard or as a reaction
HideGreetingSticker_Desc: Hides the greeting sticker when messaging a new contact
HideKeyboardOnScroll_Desc: Hides the keyboard when scrolling in the chat
HideOtherPhoneNumber: Amaga el número de telèfon de l'altra gent
HideOtherPhoneNumber_Desc: Amaga el número de telèfon de l'altra gent del seu perfil
HidePhoneNumber_Desc: Amaga el teu número de telèfon dels altres usuaris
HideSendAsChannel_Desc: Hides the send as channel action near the keyboard
HideStories_Desc: You won't see stories in the main header, but you can still find them on a user's profile.
ImportReadyDescription: An OctoGram configuration was detected in this file. Keep in mind that this will overwrite your settings. Do you want to proceed with the import?
ImportReadyDescriptionFromExternal: This file, sent by an external user, contains a configuration of OctoGram and may activate unwanted experimental options. Are you sure you want to apply it?
ImportReadyImportDonePopupDescription: Some of the imported options require a restart of the app for proper operation.
ImportReadyImportFailedZeroCaption: You must select at least one option in order to proceed with the import.
ImportReadyOtherOptions: Another %d unspecified options will be imported automatically.
JumpToNextChannelOrTopic_Desc: Permet lliscar cap amunt des d'un canal / tema per passar al següent
LiteModeSyncBatterySaverInfo: You can choose to synchronize OctoGram's power-saving mode with your device's power-saving mode.
MutualContactDesc: **%s** and you have added each other in the contacts list.
OctoAppearanceSettingsHeader: Make telegram your own by customizing the settings below
OctoCameraSettingsHeader: Here you can customize your camera experience with the app
OctoCrashedSubTitle: OctoGram s'ha aturat, ens disculpem per les molèsties. Si us plau, avisa d'aquesta aturada anant a la pestanya "Historial d'aturades" a la pàgina de configuració d'Octogram
OctoExperimentsDialogMessage: These features are experimental and may not work as expected. You may experience crashes and other issues. Please report any issues you encounter to the developers
OctoExperimentsSettingsHeader: Try out new and shiny features
OctoGeneralSettingsHeader: Aquí pots personalitzar la teva experiència general amb l'app, així com la privacitat
OctoMainSettingsFooter: OctoGram v%s. Gràcies pel teu interès en el projecte :)
OctoMainSettingsHeader: Benvingut a la configuració d'OctoGram! Aquí pots personalitzar la teva experiència amb l'app
OfficialChannel_Desc: Mantingues-te informat de les últimes actualitzacions
OpenArchiveOnPull: Pull down to Open the Archive
OpenArchiveOnPull_Desc: Automatically opens the archive when pulling down
PasscodeAlreadyUsed: Passcode already used. Please choose another one.
PencilIconForEdited_Desc: This will replace the text "Edited" with a pencil icon
PerformanceMode_Desc: Enable performance mode for CameraX. This will reduce the quality of the photos taken
PlayGifsAsVideo_Desc: Allows to play gifs as video files
PrivacyPolicyLogin:
By continuing,
you agree to the *Privacy Policy*.
PromptBeforeCalling_Desc: Ensenya un avís per evitar trucades accidentals
ResetSettingsDescription:
Are you really sure you want to reset all OctoGram settings? Any options applied will not be retained after restart.

Keep in mind that before resetting, you may want to make a backup so that you can recover these settings in the future.
SelectAccountDesc: Choose the account to lock with the passcode.
SendCrashLogDone: Crash log has been sent successfully.
ShowFakePhoneNumber_Desc: Ensenya un número de telèfon fals al teu perfil. Aquest número de telèfon fals només el veuràs tu! Si desactives la privacitat del telèfon, la gent veurà el teu nombre real
ShowNameActionBar_Desc: You will see your name on the header bar instead of "OctoGram"
ShowOnlineStatus_Desc: Shows the online status of other people next to their profile picture in groups
ShowRegistrationDate_Desc: Show user's registration date in profiles. Note that this is achieved through guessing, so it may show inaccurate results
ShowUserIconsInChatsList: Show user icons in chats list
ShowUserIconsInChatsList_Desc: Show user icons in chats list near sender name in groups.
ShowUsernameAsPhoneNumber: Ensenyar el nom d'usuari en lloc del número de telèfon
ShowUsernameAsPhoneNumber_Desc: Ensenya el teu nom d'usuari en lloc del teu número de telèfon al teu perfil. Això només se't mostrarà a tu!
SlidingTitle_Desc: The title will slide on screen when it's too long
SmartNotificationsPvtDialogMessage:
This option is, by default, disabled on the official Telegram clients and therefore in private chats all notifications were sent with sound or vibration.

By enabling it, the behavior of notifications will vary in all chats: as well as in groups, all private chats will default to 2 notifications every 3 minutes.
SmartNotificationsPvtDialogMessagePlus: You can manage this option from OctoGram settings.
StartWithRearCamera_Desc: Start recording video messages with the rear camera instead of the front camera
StickerSizePreviewMessage1: Oh, I love OctoGram 🐙! I just learned today that it's Italian, how cool!
StickerSizePreviewMessage2: In Italy, they say the pizza 🍕 is really good... When are we going?
StickerSizePreviewMessage5: I love the new OctoGram update!
StickerSizePreviewMessage6: Cool! I'm going to try it out now!
TestBackendOff: This account will connect to the production backend.
TestBackendOn: This account will connect to the test backend.
TranslateEntireChatDescription: You can choose to show the button to translate an entire chat.
TranslateOcto_Desc: Ajuda'ns a traduir OctoGram al teu idioma
TranslatorEntireUnavailable: This feature is not available with the selected provider because you do not have a Telegram Premium subscription.
TranslatorHeader: Customize the integrated message translation experience
TranslatorHeaderLong: You can customize the integrated message translation experience in OctoGram settings.
TranslatorProviderSuggestedAccurate: It's very accurate but not recommended because of high limits.
TranslatorProviderSuggestedGeneral: It's the fastest provider but may resort to translation errors.
TranslatorProviderSuggestedPremium: Recommended if the account has a Telegram Premium subscription.
TranslatorProviderUnsuggested: It doesn't support the language currently set.
TranslatorProviderUnsupported: The currently set language (%s) is not supported by the selected provider.
TranslatorProviderUnsupportedDialogs: The translation target language of some chats has been changed because the previously set language is not supported by the selected provider.
TranslatorUnsupportedLanguage: Selected language isn't supported by the selected provider.
UnlockedHiddenChupaIcon: You were chuped! Chupa's icon is now available in settings.
UnlockedHiddenYukiIcon: Hehe, you found me~. Go to the settings and change the icon!
UnmuteWithVolumeDown_Desc: Unmute a video by pressing the volume down button
UpdatesPbetaWarning: Please note that the update you are installing is part of the private beta program you joined and may have instabilities. If so, please report it in our official internal testing group.
UpdatesSettingsAutoDescription: If enabled, server will notify the app when to check for new updates.
UpdatesSettingsCheckFailed: An error occurred while checking for updates. Please try again later.
UpdatesSettingsCheckUpdated: You are using the latest version available.
UpdatesSettingsHeader: Stay up to date with the latest news from OctoGram.
UpdatesSettingsPbetaDescription:
Your main account is part of OctoGram's private beta program.

By activating this option, you can receive updates from the private beta program directly via OTA like other stable and beta updates, but some updates settings (like "%s") will be forcibly activated.
UseCameraX_Desc: Use CameraX instead of the legacy API
UseCustomDeviceNameDescription: Enter below the name you want to associate with this device. You can also choose to use the default name.
UseSystemEmojisDesc: Utilitzar els emojis del sistema en comptes dels triats
VoiceImprovements_Desc: Enables noise suppression and voice normalization while in a call
WarningBeforeDeletingChatHistory: Avís abans d'esborrar l'historial del xat
WarningBeforeDeletingChatHistory_Desc: Create a warning before deleting chat history for a user (to avoid accidental deletions)
ZeroShutter_Desc: Enable zero shutter lag for CameraX
